solution_line_template: In the bowl, there are twice more apples than bananas, so there are {num_bananas} * {apple_multiplier} = <<{num_bananas}*{apple_multiplier}={num_apples}>>{num_apples} apples.
That means there are {total_fruits} - {num_apples} - {num_bananas} = <<{total_fruits}-{num_apples}-{num_bananas}={num_oranges}>>{num_oranges} oranges in the bowl.
